resources.string: Your account is unavailable,please contact your service provider.
Please enter the device API key to connect to the device
Please go to the ecobee Consumer Portal to complete authorization using the PIN below.
Please enter the username and password to connect to the device.
Please enter the verification code found in your Ring registration Email.
Use Somfy MyLink App to obtain your System ID and the IP address.
Please enter the System ID and IP Address.
Please enter the URL, Username and Password to connect to the device.
Please select the device to be added.
Please make sure the device is in the state of network
Keep the device as close as possible to the gateway to be added
Follow onscreen instructions to perform network pairing.
Make sure the indicator is blinking rapidly.
Please enter the cloud server ID or the MAC address of the device that has been registered in the sever to obtain the server IP and the port before logging in the BelaHome app.
Your account has expired. Please log in again.
Your account is signed in elsewhere on %1$s.
Allow to run in the background
The device will be automatically updated during inactive hours.
Account is locked, unlock in %d minutes.
Account or Password is wrong,\nyou have one more chances,\naccount will be locked.
Account or Password is wrong,\nyou have two more chances,\naccount will be locked.
Add to be shown on screen?
Before delete your account, please note that this action is permanent and cannot be undone. Enter your password to confirm your decision.
This device does not support Camera2 API.
Voice will be played via speaker.
You would like to receive calls on BelaHome or Phone. If you\'d like to keep receiving phone calls though, remember that you must answer the call then dial the # to permit access.
You would like to start a group calls or sequential calls, when the visitor push the call button on the door panel.
Please select the door you want to open.
Cloudless mode is enabled.If forgot password, please reset it on the home center.
Server connection error. Please try again.
Are you sure you want to change the device type? All configurations associated to the device in all scenes will be removed.
The start date should not be empty.
Please relocate the devices in\nthis room to another room
Please describe the problem in detail.
Make sure the device is connected to power and in network mode
Is TV volume is changed up?
Is the air conditioner coolded at 24℃?

Before you add a device, you need to know:

1.Please ensure that the equipment and appliances are within 1,000 square feet of each other and in the same space.

2.Make sure your appliances support infrared remote control.
Power on the device as prompted first,and hold the RESET button for 5s

After the wiring of switch module is done, press the reset key for about 10 seconds or turn on/off the traditional switch for 5 times until the indicator light inside the module is flashing quickly for pairing.
Make sure that the indicator is blinking rapidly
The device has been removed.\nNote: When adding a device, do not reset the device for a long time.
Abnormal sensor status.Do you want to ignore this sensor and continue to change arming mode?
Abnormal sensor status.Do you want to ignore these sensors and continue to change arming mode?
When the device status is normal
When enabled, calls and notifications will be received only in the time in the schedule below.
Your device does not support BLE.
Choose %s as administrator?\nYour account will be deleted.
This action can\'t be undone,\nplease confirm to continue.
If you delete the account, all data\non the account will be wiped!
Are you sure you want to delete\nit? You can\'t undo this action!
Before deleting your account, please note that your data will be deleted.
Allow access to your camera so people\ncan see you in video calls.
Allow access to your microphone so\npeople can hear your voice.
The connection has been disconnected and is being reconnected
The current device version does not support this operation.
Please enter a room name no longer than 63 characters
You have reached the maximum number of rooms (20) allowed in this family.
Failed to add room, please try again later.
Failed to edit room, please try again later.
Failed to delete room, please try again later.
You have reached the maximum number of photos(100) allowed in this family.
You have reached the maximum number of photos(9) allowed in this device.
The device is not connected, please check the device connection status.
Unable to connect to Home Center, please check device connection status.
Failed to update, please try again later.
Failed to delete device, please try again later.
Failed to adjust device position, please try again later.
Failed to replace device, please try again later.
Fail to switch relay type, please check the device version and network status.
Account is incorrect, please try again.
Your home is in Off-Cloud mode, please turn off Off-Cloud mode before operating.
No operation permission, please configure on the master account.
Network error, please check the network and try again later
Failed to add user, please try again later.
The maximum number of user is 30 allowed in this family.
Account or Password is incorrect,please try again.
Failed to update, please try again later.
Your home is in Off-Cloud mode, please turn off Off-Cloud mode before operating.
Failed to transfer administrator permissions, please try again.
Your intercom cloud account is not activated or has expired,please contact your service provider.
Your home is in Off-Cloud mode, please turn off Off-Cloud mode before operating.
Account is locked to send email.
Account is locked, unlock in 5 minutes.
Edit failed, please add email address to this account first.
The current account already exists in the family
Account requires transform permission but not have it.
The number of families that this account has joined exceeds the limit.

Before starting, make sure the camera is clean, your face is unobstructed, and the environment is well-lit.\nYou can also setup by choosing a photo in the album.\nYou can use Face Recognition to unlock the door unit.
The resolution of this image must be at least 250x250.
Please select another photo without mask.
Please use a photo of your face straight on.
No face were detected in this photo.
The face in the photo is too small.
The face in the photo is too large.
More than one face were detected in this photo.
Make sure your face stays fully in the frame.
Please get closer to the device.
Make sure you are the only person in the frame.
The face was not clear enough. Please make sure your face is not in backlight.
If you delete the face data, you will not be able to unlock the door by facial recognition.
Use this photo as your face ID?
1.Make sure your face stays fully in frame.\n\n2.No masks and hats.
Make sure that the camera is clean, your face is not covered, and you are in a well-lit environment (avoid direct sunlight).\n\nYou can also setup by choosing a photo in the album.
No device can be added to the home page.\nPlease add a device.
No scenes can be added to the home page.\nPlease create a non-automatic scenes or\ncreate a security scenes from the cloud.
Your account has been logged in on another device!
Scan the family QR code to join this home.
When other members of the family return home, you can choose who to be notified.
Only accounts with intercom permission support this function.
Press the button on the bridge to continue.
The family data is being protected.
Unable to connect to the home center.
You are not yet bound to any home.\nPlease scan the code to join another home.
You can enable the Intercom feature for up to %d sub-accounts.
%d sub-accounts have been allowed for the Intercom feature. You have to disable this feature of one of them before you can enable it for a new account.
Invalid System ID or IP address.
Invalid input.Please check your input data.
I\'m aware of the risks.Next step
Please keep it on to ensure that incoming calls can be received in real time
In order to make video calls with visitors. Please click \"Go And Set\" to set access of following permissions.
In order to monitor the on-site environment. Please click \"Go And Set\" to set access of following permissions.
Please allow BelaHome to send you notifications, in case of missing calls from your visitors.Click \"View\" see how to set notifications permissions.
The landline caller number has been changed, please click \"Set As Contacts\" to add the new number to your contacts, so that the door phone call will not be marked as a harassing call.
Please click \"Set As Contacts\" to add the BelaHome number to your contacts, so that the door phone call will not be marked as a harassing call.
Your login is invalid. Please try again.
The password has been changed, please log in again.
Account successfully registered, please log in again.
Tap here to start the conversation
Unable to load the page!\nPlease check your connection and try again.
Are you sure you wanted delete selected records?
Please go to Settings - Apps - BelaHome to enable.
Some mobile phones cannot be redirected after clicking, or cannot receive guest calls after setting, please set according to the following \"Notification permissions setting guide\"
Please allow all the permissions below to ensure that you can receive calls from guests.
You are not authorized to perform this operation
You have no permission,Please contact family master to grant you permission in "Family Management-Family Members".
The picture not save to album, confirm to back?
Are you sure you want to open the door?
Allow BelaHome to take pictures and record video?
Allow BelaHome to access your contacts?
The current application lacks the necessary permissions.\n\n Please select \"Settings\" - \"Permission\" - Open the required permissions.
Allow BelaHome to access photos and media on your device?
Invalid face image! Please upload the valid face image.
Display pop-up windows while running in the background.
Your password must be a combination of letters and numbers.
New password and current password cannot be the same!
Confirm password and new password do not match!
Please enter the following information to create a new subaccount.
These photos are stored on the Home center.
Please read Terms and Conditions carefully to continue.
In order to continue using the App, please read the privacy agreement carefully.
Please read the Privacy Policy below.
Please read \"%s\" and \"%s\" thoroughly, and click the \"Agree\" button to indicate that you have agreed to the aforementioned agreement.\nWe will explain to you through.
This QR code cannot be recognized.
Do you want to save the changes?
Failed to close relay, please try again.
Failed to open relay, please try again
Search timeout.No devices found.Please confirm that the device is in paring mode.
Room name already exists. Please try a different one.
We will reply as soon as possible
Set BelaHome as a contact, so that the door phone can will not be marked as a harassing call.
Poor network connection, switch to audio call?
We\'ve sent an email to\n%s\nwith further instructions.

An error occurred during password
resetting,which may be due to the
following two conditions:

1. The account does not exits.

2. In Cloudless mode:Please reset
your account password from the
Family Center.
The modification is not saved.\nDo you want to exit?
This action can\'t be undone.\nplease confirm to confirm.
Reject the privacy agreement and exit the APP.
Swap the open and close functions of the relay controllers on the flush-mounted module.
The device types of the two relays connected to the same flush-mounted module are changed to %s.
This change has not been saved. Do you want to go back?
Your space name is in the wrong format.
There area %d devices in this space.After deleting the space, these devices will be moved to the space of Others
Please swipe up from the bottom of the screen-enter the multitasking interface-find BelaHome to lock it
The end time cannot be earlier than the start time.
Removing this device will remove other devices controlled by Philip Hue gateway. Are you sure to you want to remove them?
Are you sure you want to remove this device and wipe data? Scenes related to the device will be invalid and the device will be removed from the device list, all related data will be wiped.
Are you sure you want to remove this device and wipe data? The device will be removed from the device list and all related data will be wiped.
Your connection is not a private connection,if you want to continue,click continue to trust the website.
Your BelaHome temporary account has been created.
Upgrading to an official account will bring you more features, including:

1.Be able to control your smart home after you lelft home.

2.Be able to receive intercom call as phone call.

3.More feature with Akubela Cloud.
The current version is the latest: %s
The current temperature cannot be obtained.
Door status alarm has been dealt.
Please select an account as administrator first
Choose %s as administrator?\nyou will unbind this family and log out of the app.
This action can\'t be undone.\nplease confirm to continue.
Your account will be unbind from\nyour family, please confirm to\ncontinue.
This action can\'t be undone.\nplease confirm to continue.
You can scan QR code to log in.
If you decide to detach from the family, please note the following information:
You can\'t control the devices in this home anymore
You will need to contact your installer to rebind the home
%s can\'t control the devices in this home anymore
Existence of off-cloud devices,unable to operate account settings
Unable to connect to your home center
Upgrade your device to a new version?
Release and send\nSwipe up to cancel sending
Please select at least one day.
%s invites you to join his family.
Please enter the corresponding email address to continue.
